name: Hyperborea - eBook: Lore, Art, and Design
detailed_description:
If you are interested in the lore and art of Hyperborea, consider purchasing this eBook for the game! This work details the lore, art, and design for Hyperborea.


How to access the ebook:
==========================
To access your ebook, navigate to the ebook folder in your Hyperborea game folder. Upon purchasing the book, it will be downloaded in three formats: epub, mobi and PDF. Please read the book in the navigation of your choice.
